articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: As Biden nears exit, US bans medical debt from credit reports - Reuters
articles.description: President Joe Biden's outgoing administration announced on Tuesday a ban on medical debt in American consumers' credit reports, making good on a campaign year pledge less than two weeks before leaving office.

articles.author: Seb Starcevic, Jakob Weizman
articles.title: Danish PM says Greenland is still not for sale as Donald Trump Jr. arrives - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Mette Frederiksen stresses that America doesn’t call the shots on the strategically important Arctic island’s future.
articles.content: Trumps eldest son, Donald Trump Jr., landed in Greenland on Tuesday on what he called a private visit. But his entourage included firebrand conservative activist Charlie Kirk and the elder Trumps per… [+1223 chars]
